com.erdi.ezrecipes.api

Class RecipeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erdi.ezrecipes.api.RecipeManager

  • public final class RecipeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to register recipes. Also has utility methods, such as isCustomRecipe(Recipe) and getCustomRecipeName(Recipe)
    Author:
    Erdi__

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCustomRecipeName(org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe recipe)
      If the recipe has been registered by the plugin that owns this RecipeManager, this returns the recipe's name.
      org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getHostPlugin()
      Gets the plugin that owns this RecipeManager
      boolean isCustomRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe recipe)
      Checks if the given Recipe is a custom recipe registered by the plugin that owns this RecipeManager
      boolean registerRecipe(java.lang.String[] items, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,org.bukkit.Material> ingredients, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
      Register a recipe using a randomly generated name
      boolean registerRecipe(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String[] shape, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,org.bukkit.Material> ingredients, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
      Register a recipe
      boolean registerSmeltingRecipe(java.lang.String name, org.bukkit.Material source, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
      Register a smelting recipe without specifying a cooking time or experiences
      boolean registerSmeltingRecipe(java.lang.String name, org.bukkit.Material source, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result, int cookingTime, float experience)
      Register a smelting recipe.
      In case the server is a legacy server (1.13 or lower), cookingTime and/or experience will be ignored if it does not exist in Bukkit's FurnaceRecipe class

    • Method Detail

      • registerRecipe

        public boolean registerRecipe(@Nonnull
                              java.lang.String name,
                              @Nonnull
                              java.lang.String[] shape,
                              @Nonnull
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,org.bukkit.Material> ingredients,
                              @Nonnull
                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
        Register a recipe
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the recipe. If null, a random name is generated
        shape - The shape of the recipe. Should replicate a 3x3 grid
        ingredients - The ingredients of the recipe
        result - The result of this recipe
        Returns:
        true if the recipe was successfully added

      • registerSmeltingRecipe

        public boolean registerSmeltingRecipe(@Nonnull
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      org.bukkit.Material source,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
        Register a smelting recipe without specifying a cooking time or experiences
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the recipe. If null, a random name is generated
        Returns:
        true if the recipe was successfully added

      • registerSmeltingRecipe

        public boolean registerSmeltingRecipe(@Nonnull
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      org.bukkit.Material source,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result,
                                      int cookingTime,
                                      float experience)
        Register a smelting recipe.
        In case the server is a legacy server (1.13 or lower), cookingTime and/or experience will be ignored if it does not exist in Bukkit's FurnaceRecipe class
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the recipe. If null, a random name is generated
        source - The item required to smelt the result
        result - The resulting item
        cookingTime - The time needed to smelt the source. Ignored in legacy versions (1.13 and lower)
        experience - The experience given after smelting. Ignored in 1.8.x
        Returns:
        true if the recipe was successfully added

        Parameters:

        result -
        Returns:

        See Also:
        registerRecipe(String, String[], Map, ItemStack)

      • isCustomRecipe

        public boolean isCustomRecipe(org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe recipe)
        Checks if the given Recipe is a custom recipe registered by the plugin that owns this RecipeManager
        Parameters:
        recipe -
        Returns:
        true if the recipe is a recipe registered by the plugin that owns this RecipeManager

      • getCustomRecipeName

        public java.lang.String getCustomRecipeName(org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe recipe)
        If the recipe has been registered by the plugin that owns this RecipeManager, this returns the recipe's name. Else, this returns null
        Parameters:
        recipe -
        Returns:
        the name of the recipe registered by the plugin that owns this RecipeManager if it exists, else null

public org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getHostPlugin()
        Gets the plugin that owns this RecipeManager
        Returns:
